title: An aduertisement of corruption in our handling of religion To the Kings Majestie. By Hugh Broughton.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
notes: In part an attack on: Lively, Edward.  A true chronologie of the times of the Persian monarchie, and after to the destruction of Jerusalem by the Romanes.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Running title reads: Corruption in our handling of religion.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
